name: Empress of the Deep 2 [Full]
description:
Anna awakens on a mysterious tiny island after escaping the destruction of her underwater kingdom. She must find her way to a mystical floating cloud city in the sky, seek out the four Children of Light and save them from the twisted clutches of the Evil Empress Pandora. Along the way she must rescue and heal enchanted animal slaves in this fantastic Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆

✓ Rich graphical adventure spanning 9 chapters
✓ Multiple Hidden Object scenes, collectibles, & puzzle modes
✓ Explore a mystical floating city!

☆☆ Want to experience the first episode in the Empress of the Deep story, too? Help Anna through a mysterious underwater temple in Empress of the Deep: The Darkest Secret!  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bigfishgames.google.empress1free or search Google Play for Empress of the Deep: The Darkest Secret. ☆☆

☆☆☆ Discover more from Big Fish Games! ☆☆☆

Renowned for offering A New Game Every Day!® on www.bigfishgames.com, Big Fish Games distributes more than two million games per day worldwide.
